description:
classification of environmental conditions and their severities to which a product may be exposed during transportation at a given location in accordance with IEC 60721-3-2.
Note 1 In order to limit the possibilities to general cases, standard sets of class combinations may be selected from IEC 60721-3-2, Table 6. For a given location or product, reference may then be made to this standard, for example IE22. |
Note 2 Only when conditions are considered not to be covered by this specification, reference should be made to the total set of classes, for example 2K2/2B2/2C2/2S2/2M1.|
Note 3 If the classes in IEC 60721-3-1 do not cover the environmental conditions it is recommended to specify the relevant environmental conditions as specified under AAA650.

name.defaultValue: environmental condition class combinations for transportation

i18nValue.en_US: environmental condition class combinations for transportation
